Title: Frenzy
Writer: Arthur La Bern (based on the novel "Goodbye Piccadilly,  Farewell Leicester Square" by), Anthony Shaffer (screenplay by)
Actors: Jon Finch, Barry Foster, Barbara Leigh-Hunt, Anna Massey
Plot: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
